column4: yea go ahead and have it out in public. noone cares about you anyways it shouldn't be a problem
i guess the question is. If someone did care about me. What types of issues do i really expose myself to?
Someone would have to basically write some code that generated potential private keys and run them agains the public key to guess it.
u can hire a CS degree having person for $5.99 an hour or whatever the minumum wage is to write that code
